resources:
palestine
GlobalPalestineSupport is a transparent platform for humanitarian aid in Palestine. Amid ongoing War- Crime, Genocide done by Israel, Palestinians struggle with access to basic right like healthcare, food, and resources. We make every donation count by providing real-time updates, country-specific insights, and clear project reports. Our commitment to openness and accountability builds trust, empowering donors to make a lasting impact.
